nodes.text: The Intrepid Heart was a GX1 short hauler of the Galactic Republic that was used as the personal transport of a Jedi Master on a mission to recover Sith artifacts which was eventually lost. During the Imperial Era, sources in the Alliance to Restore the Republic stated that a Rebel Commando team spotted a crashed GX1 short hauler in the mountains of Naator, and records suggested that it might have been the Intrepid Heart. The ship was outfitted with the livery of the Republic.
